objects.text:
• Spacious Design
• Faux Leather
• Gold Hardware
• Everyday Elegance

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a luxury product with a premium aesthetic, designed to draw attention to a stylish tote bag. The backdrop is diagonally split with a rich terracotta brown (#8D5B4C) transitioning into a soft beige (#E6D2C7), giving a warm and elegant feel. Subtle gold gradient geometric accents and lines add a layer of sophistication. The top-left area features bold text ("heading") followed by a soft serif tagline ("subheading"). The brand name is highlighted in gold ("brand_name") above a bullet list of product features ("description"). Beneath it are item dimensions ("dimensions"), a bold price tag ("price"), and a strong call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta"). The right side presents the product image ("product_image"), centrally aligned for impact.

**Color Palette:**
- Terracotta Brown: `#8D5B4C`
- Beige/Cream: `#E6D2C7`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Light Cream: `#F5F5F5`
- Black (CTA text): `#1A1A1A`
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated tan handbag with gold metallic accents, creating a luxurious and warm visual appeal. The dominant color is a soft tan brown (#B1785E), which provides an elegant and neutral base ideal for versatile styling. Gold hardware (#D4AF37) is used for embellishments, chains, and branding, adding a touch of opulence and highlighting specific details without overpowering the main color. These two tones blend seamlessly, where the matte leather texture contrasts subtly with the shiny gold elements, enhancing visual interest. For ad banners, incorporating muted beige (#DED3C2) and soft ivory (#F7F4EE) will further accentuate the product's elegance.
